mapper.insert: insert into website_user (user_id, login_account, login_passwd, user_name, user_head, user_phone, user_email, user_sex, user_birthday, register_date, user_phone_verify, user_email_verify ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userPhoneVerify,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userEmailVerify,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update:
update website_user
login_account = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_passwd = #{loginPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_head = #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE},
user_phone_verify = #{userPhoneVerify,jdbcType=BIT},
user_email_verify = #{userEmailVerify,jdbcType=BIT},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update website_user set login_account = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_passwd = #{loginPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_head = #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, user_phone_verify = #{userPhoneVerify,jdbcType=BIT}, user_email_verify = #{userEmailVerify,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from website_user where login_account=#{0} and login_passwd=#{1};
select * from website_user where login_account like '%#{0}%';
